name: Ultramarine RS 10
description: Ultramarine RS 10 is a moderate tinting strength, very red shade Ultramarine blue. It is heat fast, lightfast, very easy to disperse and approved worldwide for use in sensitive applications such as food contact plastics and cosmetics.While notas strong or bright as other grades in the R.S.Pigments range, RS 10 can offer a cost effective solution where only limited technical properties are required.Ultramarine RS 10 is intended as a general purpose pigment with applications in paint, ink, soap, cosmetics and many other industries. Ultramarine RS 10 can be used in plastics.
